message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll love.
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

Thank you for your offer, Bob! I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm not quite willing to go that low. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $110. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $95. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

I understand that you're trying to get the best deal, Bob. I'm willing to compromise a bit more. I can offer it to you for $105. It's the lowest I'm willing to go, but I think it's a fair price considering the product's value.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $98. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $102. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, so I hope we can meet in the middle.
I appreciate your willingness to make one more concession, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $99. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

I'm really close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $101. This is the final offer I'm willing to make. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider other options.
I appreciate your willingness to make one more concession, but I'm really close to my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
